Supervised learning for factor investing
================
This page contains teaching material (**R** code) for **introductory** courses on supervised learning applied to factor investing.   

------------------------------------------------------------------------


Sessions
----

The links below lead to **html** notebooks and **pdf** slides. The original **Rmd** files can be downloaded hereafter.

1.  **Economic foundations**: asset pricing anomalies, characteristics-based investing;   
<a href="files/ML_course/S1_Foundations.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S1_Foundations.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

2.  **Portfolio strategies**: portfolio back-testing framework;    
<a href="files/ML_course/S2_Portfolio.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S2_Portfolio.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

3.  **Penalized regressions & sparse portfolios**: penalised regressions for minimumn variance portfolios and for robust forecasts;    
<a href="files/ML_course/S3_Lasso.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S3_LASSO.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

4.  **Data preparation**: Feature engineering and labelling with a focus on categorical data;     
<a href="files/ML_course/S4_Data.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S4_Data.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

5.  **Decision trees**: Simple trees, random forests and boosted trees;     
<a href="files/ML_course/S5_Trees.nb.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S5_Trees.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a> 

6.  **Neural networks**: Multilayer perceptron and recurrent networks (**G**ated **R**ecurrent **U**nits);     
<a href="files/ML_course/S6_NN.nb.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S6_NN.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>   

7.  **Validating & tuning**: Performance metrics and hyper-parameter adjustment;     
<a href="files/ML_course/S7_Validation.nb.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S7_Tuning.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>

8.  **Extensions**: SVMs, ensemble learning, interpretability and deflated Sharpe ratios;    
<a href="files/ML_course/S8_Extensions.nb.html" target="_blank">**html notebook**</a> - <a href="files/ML_course/S8_Extensions.pdf" target="_blank">**slides**</a>
